name: S.F. Bravo
description:
Description

"Making them 3D in GameMaker is not possible" they said. So here I am, making a 3D FPS Shooter in GM Studio 1.4.

Special Force Bravo (or S.F. Bravo) is a fast-paced modern FPS made in GameMaker Studio 1.4. It is now in early development stage. Gameplay-wise, it will ressemble Call of Duty and Counter Strike. Maps will not be large and I dont expect vehicles & driving either. What I expect is more emphasis on weapon customization.

Roadmap
